contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help you with your visa questions and travel planning needs.

form.title: Send us a message
form.message_placeholder: Please provide details about your inquiry...

questions.title: Questions About Visa Requirements?
questions.description: Our team of visa experts is ready to help you understand the requirements for your destination and guide you through the application process.

partnerships.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnerships.description: We're always looking to partner with travel agencies, visa service providers, and tourism organizations to better serve travelers worldwide.

about.title: About GetTravelVisa.com
about.subtitle: We help travelers navigate the complex world of visa requirements with minimal hassle. Our mission is to simplify international travel by providing comprehensive visa information, eligibility checking, and seamless application services.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We help travelers navigate the complex world of visa requirements with minimal hassle. Our mission is to simplify international travel by providing comprehensive visa information, eligibility checking, and seamless application services.

documentCenter.title: Centralized Document Center
documentCenter.description: We collect your documents and provide a comprehensive list of destinations available for your specific situation.

rapidApply.title: Rapid Apply Service
rapidApply.description: We handle the visa application process for you or connect you with trusted visa service agencies.

visaCatalog.title: Comprehensive Visa Catalog
visaCatalog.description: Access destination-driven, informative content that helps you understand everything about visa requirements for each country.

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.item1: Help users travel with minimal or no visa processing complications
objectives.item2: Simplify the visa application process through technology and expertise
objectives.item3: Provide accurate, up-to-date visa information for all destinations

expertise.title: Expert Support
expertise.description: Expert support throughout your application process

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Global reach with comprehensive destination coverage

trust.title: Trusted Service
trust.description: Trusted by thousands of travelers worldwide

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically when you use our services:
dataCollection.item1: Personal information such as name, email address, and phone number
dataCollection.item4: Usage data and preferences when using our website

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the information we collect to:
dataUsage.item1: Process visa applications and provide our services
dataUsage.item2: Communicate with you about your applications
dataUsage.item3: Improve our services and website functionality
dataUsage.item4: Send important updates and promotional materials

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic site functionality and security

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our website

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show you relevant advertisements

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
userRights.item1: Access and obtain a copy of your personal data
userRights.item3: Request deletion of your personal data
userRights.item4: Object to processing of your personal data
userRights.item5: Data portability and withdrawal of consent

gdprCompliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdprCompliance.description: We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and protecting the rights of EU residents.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: We process your data based on consent, contract performance, legal obligations, and legitimate interests.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We may share your information with:
dataSharing.item1: Visa service providers and government agencies as required for processing
dataSharing.item2: Service providers who help us operate our business
dataSharing.item3: Legal authorities when required by law

security.title: Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using GetTravelVisa.com, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Description of Services
services.item1: Visa information and eligibility checking services
services.item2: Visa application assistance and document processing
services.item4: Connection to trusted visa service providers

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: As a user of our services, you agree to:
userResponsibilities.item2: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
userResponsibilities.item3: Not misuse our services or website
userResponsibilities.item5: Maintain the confidentiality of your account

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.description: You may not use our services to:

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.item1: Engage in fraudulent or illegal activities
prohibited.item3: Harm or attempt to harm our systems
prohibited.item4: Infringe on others' rights or privacy

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content and materials on our website are protected by intellectual property laws.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: We own or license all intellectual property rights in our website and services.

license.title: License to Use
license.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use our services for personal purposes.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.description: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind:
disclaimers.item1: We do not guarantee visa approval or processing times
disclaimers.item2: Information may not always be current or complete
disclaimers.item3: We are not responsible for government policy changes
disclaimers.item4: Service availability may vary by location

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, losses, or damages arising from your use of our services or violation of these terms.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your access to our services at any time for any reason.
termination.item1: You may terminate your account at any time
termination.item2: We may terminate accounts for violations of these terms

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where our company is incorporated.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
